## Source: ossf-package-analysis (98a856f629a1b4854c5202dbdd7b0919ec1ad20cd28a8fa2b52591843913f112)
The OpenSSF Package Analysis project identified 'rey-vue-smarttable' @ 19.19.19 (npm) as malicious.

It is considered malicious because:

- The package communicates with a domain associated with malicious activity.

- The package executes one or more commands associated with malicious behavior.
